de.wingu.sdk.notification

Interface ChannelNotificationsConfig.ChannelNotificationCallback

  • Enclosing class:
    ChannelNotificationsConfig

    public static interface ChannelNotificationsConfig.ChannelNotificationCallback
    Callbacks for creating channel notifications.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String contentText(Collection<Channel> channels)
      The second line of a notification.
      String contentTitle(Collection<Channel> channels)
      The first line of a notification.
      PendingIntent pendingIntent(Collection<Channel> channels)
      A PendingIntent to be sent when the notification is clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • contentText

        String contentText(Collection<Channel> channels)
        The second line of a notification.
        Parameters:
        channels - Collection of channels (can be empty).
        See Also:
        Notification.Builder.setContentText(CharSequence)

      • contentTitle

        String contentTitle(Collection<Channel> channels)
        The first line of a notification.
        Parameters:
        channels - Collection of channels (can be empty).
        See Also:
        Notification.Builder.setContentTitle(CharSequence)

      • pendingIntent

        @Nullable
PendingIntent pendingIntent(Collection<Channel> channels)
        A PendingIntent to be sent when the notification is clicked. When returning null, the notification will not be shown, and previous notifications will be cleared.
        Parameters:
        channels - Collection of channels (can be empty).
        See Also:
        Notification.contentIntent
